subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Brett Favre is gone, traded to the Jets after one of the ugliest splits between a team and its star player. After shaking off the distraction, the Packers said they expected to contend again this season.
snippet: Brett Favre is gone, traded to the Jets after one of the ugliest splits between a team and its star player. After shaking off the distraction, the Packers said they expected to contend again this season.
